/usr/bin/c++    -lglfw3 -lGL -lX11 -lpthread -lXrandr -lXi -ldl CMakeFiles/gltut.dir/renders/quick_normals.cpp.o  -o gltut  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a libsrclib.a /usr/local/lib/libassimp.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so -lm -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libX11.so -lpthread
